data.text: @SuryaKuppuswamy @michaelmina_lab @FoodLion @EricTopol @DanielGriffinMD @profvrr Read the small print- only with an MVP card. Otherwise, $14.96 each.
@SuryaKuppuswamy @FoodLion @michaelmina_lab @EricTopol @DanielGriffinMD @profvrr Wow. This is fantastic. Hopefully more stores will follow suit on this pricing.🤞
@SuryaKuppuswamy @FoodLion @michaelmina_lab @EricTopol @DanielGriffinMD @profvrr can these come with extra swabs in future, to facilitate group testing (less expensive, less waste)?
@SuryaKuppuswamy @FoodLion @michaelmina_lab @EricTopol @DanielGriffinMD @profvrr You can get them free from the government.  I've already received 2. Completely free

@SuryaKuppuswamy @michaelmina_lab @FoodLion @EricTopol @DanielGriffinMD @profvrr $5 or free from the government. Shame the govt was so late to act. I blew $500 on tests for my family over the holidays
@SuryaKuppuswamy @FoodLion @michaelmina_lab @EricTopol @DanielGriffinMD @profvrr This should have happened 18 months ago!
@SuryaKuppuswamy @michaelmina_lab @FoodLion @EricTopol @DanielGriffinMD @profvrr Now that demand is down. Classic.
